<Text: United States Assistant Secretary of State:  Assistant Secretaries usually manage individual bureaus of the Department of State.>

Text: United States Assistant Secretary of State:  When the manager of a bureau or another agency holds a title other than Assistant Secretary, such as "Director," it can be said to be of "Assistant Secretary equivalent rank."
